attributes.action: Help homeless people get safe place and roof over head not staying on street
attributes.additional_details: There are lot of homeless all over UK.This time to far.They been given penalty for being,they been given penalty for sleeping on street.Do they deserve this?Is disgusting what is happening how you can give penalty to people with no home no money.Please help us give them roof over their head and new start in their life.
attributes.background: There are tomany empty houses etc after prison all over the UK.Why not use them for homeless people to give them roof over their head rather than freeze to death on street at night.We are not any better we are all humans and all of us deserve home.help us make changes in UK

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do to help homeless people.
